org.drip.math.grid

Class SegmentMonotonocity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.grid.SegmentMonotonocity

  • public class SegmentMonotonocity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the monotonicity details related to the given segment. Indicates whether the segment is monotonic, and if not, whether it contains a maximum, a minimum, or an inflection.
